record.title: MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2596, S. 2615, S. 2616, and S. 2619
record.narrative:
MEASURES PLACED ON THE CALENDAR--S. 2596, S. 2615, S. 2616, and S. 2619 -- (Senate - February 11, 2008)

[Page: S823]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I have one small item of business. It is my understanding there are four bills due for second readings.

record.chair: The Senator is correct. The clerk will report the bills by title for the second time.
The bill clerk read as follows:

A bill (S. 2596) to rescind funds appropriated by the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2008, for the City of Berkeley, California, and any entities located in such city, and to provide that such funds shall be transferred to the Operation and Maintenance, Marine Corps account of the Department of Defense for the purposes of recruiting.
A bill (S. 2615) to extend the Protect America Act of 2007 for 15 days.
A bill (S. 2616) to authorize certain programs and activities in the Forest Service, the Department of Interior, and the Department of Energy, and for other purposes.
A bill (S. 2619) to protect innocent Americans from violent crime in national parks.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I object to further proceedings with respect to these bills en bloc.

record.chair: Objection having been heard, the bills will be placed on the calendar.
